cast.name: 克斯汀·埃伯索尔 Christine Ebersole
弗雷德·塞伯特 Fred Seibert

this_title: Ghost Empire: The Forgotten Story of Harvey Comics
introduction: For half a century Harvey Comics characters ruled newsstands, television screens and the imaginations of children across the United States. While the names Casper the Friendly Ghost, Richie Rich, Little Audrey, Dick Tracy, The Green Hornet live on, Harvey Comics has been largely forgotten. This film will bring together stories from family members, artists, and historians and celebrities to reveal the untold story of a company that changed comic books and pop culture forever.
chinese_title: Ghost Empire: The Forgotten Story of Harvey Comics
